Module chav1961.purelib
Package chav1961.purelib.model

Class ModelUtils

java.lang.Object
chav1961.purelib.model.ModelUtils
public class ModelUtils
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class supports most of useful operations with models.

Since:
0.0.3
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
See Also:
chav1961.purelib.model.interfaces
LastUpdate:
0.0.4

      public static java.lang.String toString​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metaData)

      Convert model tree to tree text

      Parameters:
      metaData - model tree to convert
      Returns:
      tree text converted. Can be empty but not null
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when metadata is null

    • getValueByGetter

      public static java.lang.Object getValueByGetter​(java.lang.Object instance, GettersAndSettersFactory.GetterAndSetter gas, ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metadata) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, ContentException

      Get value from instance by getters and setters

      Parameters:
      instance - instance to get value from
      gas - getter and setter to access to instance field
      metadata - mode meta data for the given getter and setter
      Returns:
      value extracted
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
      ContentException - on any errors while getting value

    • getValueByGetter

      public static java.lang.Object getValueByGetter​(java.lang.Object instance, java.net.URI applicationURI, ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metadata) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, ContentException

      Get value from instance by it's application URI

      Parameters:
      instance - instance to get value from
      applicationURI - URI of the field to extract
      metadata - mode meta data for the given getter and setter
      Returns:
      value extracted
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
      ContentException - on any errors while getting value

    • setValueBySetter

      public static void setValueBySetter​(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.Object value, GettersAndSettersFactory.GetterAndSetter gas, ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metadata) throws ContentException, java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Store value into instance by getters and setters

      Parameters:
      instance - instance to store value to
      value - value to store
      gas - getter and setter to access to instance field
      metadata - mode meta data for the given getter and setter
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value to store is incompatible with target setter
      ContentException - on any errors while setting value

    • setValueBySetter

      public static void setValueBySetter​(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.Object value, java.net.URI applicationURI, ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata metadata) throws java.lang.NullPointerException, ContentException

      Store value into instance by application URI

      Parameters:
      instance - instance to store value to
      value - value to store
      applicationURI - URI of the field to store
      metadata - mode meta data for the given getter and setter
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any parameters are null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if value to store is incompatible with target setter
      ContentException - on any errors while setting value

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      node cloned. Can't be null
      Throws:

      Parameters:
      parser - parser to deserialize node from
      Returns:
      node deserialized. Can't be null

    • deserializeFromJson

      public static MutableContentNodeMetadata deserializeFromJson​(JsonStaxParser parser, java.lang.ClassLoader loader) throws java.io.IOException

      Deserialize content metadata from JSON

      Parameters:
      parser - parser to deserialize node from
      loader - class loader to seek node type in
      Returns:
      node deserialized. Can't be null
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - on any I/O errors
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when any parameter is null
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • compare

      public static boolean compare​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata left, ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata right, ModelUtils.ModelComparisonCallback callback)

      Compare two nodes item-by item and process callback on changes

      Parameters:
      left - let node to compare
      right - right node to compare
      callback - callback to process changes detected
      Returns:
      true if no changes were detected or all detected changes are accepted. Changes are accepted when callback always returned ContinueMode.CONTINUE.
      Throws:
      java.lang.NullPointerException - if any argument is null
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • buildMappedClassByModel

      public static <K,​ V> java.lang.Class<java.util.Map<K,​V>> buildMappedClassByModel​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata root, java.lang.String classPath) throws ContentException

      Build temporary class to keep model fields and get access to them by it's names. Class has been built will implements Map interface. All fields in the class will be public

      Type Parameters:
      K - Map key type
      V - Map value type
      Parameters:
      root - root of the content model
      classPath - class path (as package.package....ClassName)
      Returns:
      class built. Call Class.newInstance() method to create instance of the class.
      Throws:
      ContentException - on any errors when building class
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • buildMappedWrapperClassByModel

      public static <K,​ V> java.lang.Class<java.util.Map<K,​V>> buildMappedWrapperClassByModel​(ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata root, java.lang.String classPath) throws ContentException, java.lang.NullPointerException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

      Build Map-styled wrapper to any class by it's model. Wrapper allows to get access to instance fields thru Map interface instead of reflective calls. Public and non-public fields are supported. Wrapper class returned also implements ModuleExporter interface, which can be used to allow access for it's unnamed modules in Java 1.9 and higher

      Type Parameters:
      K - Map key type
      V - Map value type
      Parameters:
      root - root of the model tree
      classPath - class path (as package.package....ClassName)
      Returns:
      class built. Call Class#newInstance(Object wrappee) method to create instance of the wrapper class.
      Throws:
      ContentException - on any errors when building mapped class
      java.lang.NullPointerException - when root is null
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when classpath string is null or empty
      Since:
      0.0.4

    • placeChildrenIntoRoot

      public static void placeChildrenIntoRoot​(MutableContentNodeMetadata root, ContentMetadataInterface.ContentNodeMetadata... children)
